directions: Remove core from apples and pear. Keep skin intact and cut into thin long strips. Dice the pear.
Combine figs, dates and water in a saucepan. Bring to a boil for 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat and add the fruits and rock sugar.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until fruits are soft. Add lemon slices.
ingredients: 8 dried red dates, seeded and cut into thin slices
title: Pear and Apple Soup
